turns.text: Where have you been on wonderful vacation
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well normally when we go on vacation we go home to Colorado

turns.label: sd

turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh as of you cant even ski there anymore
turns.label: b

So that wouldnt be good spot to go on vacation now --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- you know well now I dont know Now Colorado Springs is real accessible to Lake Breckenridge --
-- its only couple of hours away And uh so its it might not be too bad if you want to go skiing somewhere else But you cant cant ski up there any more
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh Id like to go on vacation I - my husband and I want to go to Florida --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- to go to Disney World but we have two little ones --
-- that are under two right now so we want to wait until theyre little bit older --
Well we went on family cruise last year on the Premier Family Cruise Line and then we went to Disney It was all part of the package
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And on the cruise ship they had Mickey and Minnie and Chip and Dale and Goofy and Donald Duck and it was really oriented toward little kids
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So the kids could eat with Chip and Dale you know and you know --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- it was just lot of fun
So then we were on the cruise for three days in the Bahamas and then landed at Cape Canaveral and then drove over to Orlando and spent four days at Disney
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yes that was the way to travel
turns.label: b

turns.text: And it was all big package deal --
turns.label: qy^d

turns.text: -- where you just pay one price --
Thats right and kids are really cheaper too
turns.label: na^r

turns.text: We really lucked out because the ship we were supposed to be on developed engine trouble two days before our cruise so they said we could either cancel reschedule or take whatever was available So we took whatever was available and we left day early and they put us up at the Cocoa Beach Hilton and the ship that was available the only uh rooms that hadnt been booked were the suites
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So we got the suites at the same price as regular cabin
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So then our cruise was actually extended day and our Disney was extended day so we turned seven day trip into ten --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah I bet That sounds like the way Id want to do it --
turns.label: aa
